content: Singaporean politician **Gho Sze Kee**[a] (born 9 April 1979) is a Singaporean shipping lawyer and politician. She has been representing the [Mountbatten Single Member Constituency](/wiki/Mountbatten_Single_Member_Constituency) (SMC) as a member of the governing [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) (PAP) since 2025. ## Career Gho is a shipping lawyer. ### Political career In April 2025, Gho was announced as the PAP candidate for Mountbatten SMC in the [2025 general election](/wiki/2025_Singaporean_general_election) after the retirement of incumbent [Lim Biow Chuan](/wiki/Lim_Biow_Chuan). She defeated independent candidate Jeremy Tan with 63.82% of the vote. ## Honors Gho was awarded the [Public Service Medal](/wiki/Public_Service_Medal_(Singapore)) in 2023. ## Notes [Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)Preceded by[Lim Biow Chuan](/wiki/Lim_Biow_Chuan) **Member of Parliament for [Mountbatten SMC](/wiki/Mountbatten_SMC)** 2025â€“present**Incumbent** This article about a politician from Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Gho Sze Kee
